apple_vendor_description: This intimate emoji on Apple devices portrays a woman with a medium-dark skin tone leaning in for a kiss, her lips slightly pursed with a gentle smile. Apple's signature glossy shading and soft rounded edges give her face a warm, approachable glow, with subtle highlights reflecting realistic light.
